planets.title: Mercury
planets.description: Mercury is the smallest planet and orbits the Sun every 88 days.

planets.title: Venus
planets.description: Venus has a runaway greenhouse atmosphere and surface temps hot enough to melt lead.

planets.title: Earth
planets.description: Earth is the only known world with liquid water on the surface and life as we know it.

planets.title: Mars
planets.description: Mars is a dusty desert world with the largest volcano in the Solar System: Olympus Mons.
